description: Statistical unit area (SOA) code - ONS LSOA 2011 (LSOA11CD), Scottish Data Zone 2011 (DZ11CD) or Northern Ireland Super Output Area (SOA11CD)
A simple ranking of the SOA from most to least deprived.
Percentage - where the most deprived 1% of SOAs are 1 and the next most deprived 1% are 2 etc.
Grouping the most deprived 10% of SOAs as Decile 1 and the second most deprived 10% as decile 2 etc.
A simple ranking of the LA from most to least deprived.
Percentage - where the most deprived 1% of LAs are 1 and the next most deprived 1% are 2 etc.
Grouping the most deprived 10% of LAs as Decile 1 and the second most deprived 10% as decile 2 etc.
